tool_description: Get the latest movies currently in theaters
name: Newly Released Movies
title: Newly Released Movies

api_list.name: Get All Genres
api_list.description: Get all movie genres. Use these genres to query movies in theaters by genre.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newly-released-movies.p.rapidapi.com/genres"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newly-released-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Movies in Theater by Genre
api_list.description: Query a specific genre and fetch all movies currently in theaters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newly-released-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies/Action%2FAdventure"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newly-released-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Movies in Theater
